Key.Original: Displays the squad HUD as long as this key is pressed.
Key.English: Displays the squad HUD as long as this key is pressed.
Key.Spanish: Muestra el HUD del pelotón mientras presiones esta tecla.

Key.Original: DEPRECATED! Use the toggle options in the main settings instead. This option is only kept for compatibility reasons.
Key.English: DEPRECATED! Use the toggle options in the main settings instead. This option is only kept for compatibility reasons.
Key.Spanish: OBSOLETO! Usa las opciones de alternar en los ajustes principales. Sólo se mantiene esta opción por motivos de compatibilidad.

Key.Original: Displays the Identification, Friend or Foe (IFF) HUD as long as this key is pressed.
Key.English: Displays the Identification, Friend or Foe (IFF) HUD as long as this key is pressed.
Key.Spanish: Muestra el HUD de amigos o enemigos conocidos mientras presiones esta tecla.

Key.Original: DEPRECATED! Use the toggle options in the main settings instead. This option is only kept for compatibility reasons.
Key.English: DEPRECATED! Use the toggle options in the main settings instead. This option is only kept for compatibility reasons.
Key.Spanish: OBSOLETO! Usa las opciones de alternar en los ajustes principales. Sólo se mantiene esta opción por motivos de compatibilidad.

Key.Original: Enables or disables the whole feedback system.
Key.English: Enables or disables the whole feedback system.
Key.Spanish: Activa o desactiva todo el sistema de feedback.
Perfil (se aplica tras cerrar esta ventana)

Key.Original:
Choosing a profile will change the activation status of the following settings: 
 - Display Squad HUD 
 - Display Known Enemies 
 - Display Icon 
 - Display Text 
 - Display Team Color 
 - Display Index 
 - Display Name 
 - Display Class 
 - Display Roles 
 - Display Distance 
 - Display Arrows and Text 
 - Always Display Index 
 - Display Crew 
 - Display Dead Units 
 - Display Squad Critical Conditions 
 - Display Known Enemies 
 - Display Known Friendlies 
 - Show IFF HUD when alone 
 - Only display last known enemy positions 
 - Only display last known friendly positions 
 - Enemy icons for BLUFOR 
 - Use Enemy side colors 
 - Use Friendly side colors 
If you change the profile any further changes to those settings won't be applied after you close this window.
Key.English:
Choosing a profile will change the activation status of the following settings: 
 - Display Squad HUD 
 - Display Known Enemies 
 - Display Icon 
 - Display Text 
 - Display Team Color 
 - Display Index 
 - Display Name 
 - Display Class 
 - Display Roles 
 - Display Distance 
 - Display Arrows and Text 
 - Always Display Index 
 - Display Crew 
 - Display Dead Units 
 - Display Squad Critical Conditions 
 - Display Known Enemies 
 - Display Known Friendlies 
 - Show IFF HUD when alone 
 - Only display last known enemy positions 
 - Only display last known friendly positions 
 - Enemy icons for BLUFOR 
 - Use Enemy side colors 
 - Use Friendly side colors 
If you change the profile any further changes to those settings won't be applied after you close this window.
Key.Spanish:
Al elegir un perfil cambiará el estado de activación de los siguientes ajustes: 
 - Mostrar HUD del Pelotón 
 - Mostrar Enemigos Conocidos 
 - Mostrar Icono 
 - Mostrar Texto 
 - Mostrar Color del Equipo 
 - Mostrar Índice 
 - Mostrar Nombre 
 - Mostrar Clase 
 - Mostrar Roles 
 - Mostrar Distancia 
 - Mostrar Flechas y Texto 
 - Siempre Mostrar Índice 
 - Mostrar Tripulación 
 - Mostrar Unidades Fallecidas 
 - Mostrar Condiciones Críticas 
 - Mostrar Enemigos Conocidos 
 - Mostrar Amistosos Conocidos 
 - Mostrar HUD IFF si sólo 
 - Sólo mostrar última position conocida de enemigos 
 - Sólo mostrar última position conocida de amistosos 
 - Iconos de enemigo para BLUFOR 
 - Colores de bando para enemigos 
 - Colores de bando para amistosos 
Si cambias el perfil cualquier otro cambio a esos ajustes no será aplicado tras cerrar esta ventana.

Key.Original: Toggles the activation of your squad's feeback HUD.
Key.English: Toggles the activation of your squad's feeback HUD.
Key.Spanish: Alterna la activación del HUD de información del pelotón.

Key.Original:
Choose when to display known enemy locations. 

If 'Only with IFF device' is chosen the HUD will only be shown when you have equipped one of these: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets 

You can add more in the 'Additional IFF Devices' section below.
Key.English:
Choose when to display known enemy locations. 

If 'Only with IFF device' is chosen the HUD will only be shown when you have equipped one of these: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets 

You can add more in the 'Additional IFF Devices' section below.
Key.Spanish:
Elige cuándo mostrar la posición de los enemigos conocidos. 

Si eliges 'Sólo con Disp. IFF' el HUD solo se mostrará cuando tengas equipado uno de estos: 
 - Gafas de Combate (cualquier versión, incluyendo pasamontañas) 
 - Gafas Tácticas (cualquier versión) 
 - Sistema de Realidad Virtual 
 - Casco de Asesino (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco Defensor (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Piloto (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Operaciones Especiales (cualquier versión) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets 

Puedes añadir más en la sección 'Dispositivos IFF Adicionales' de más abajo.
Alternar tecla de HUD del Pelotón

Key.Original: Toggles the activation of your squad's feeback HUD.
Key.English: Toggles the activation of your squad's feeback HUD.
Key.Spanish: Alterna la activación del HUD de información del pelotón.
Alternar tecla de HUD del Pelotón

Key.Original: Toggles the activation of the IFF HUD.
Key.English: Toggles the activation of the IFF HUD.
Key.Spanish: Alterna la activación del HUD de IFF.
Velocidad de Refresco del HUD del Pelotón

Key.Original: Waiting time between HUD redraws, in seconds. \nYou can set this value higher if the game performance is badly affected, but you'll see the HUD flickering.
Key.English: Waiting time between HUD redraws, in seconds. \nYou can set this value higher if the game performance is badly affected, but you'll see the HUD flickering.
Key.Spanish: Tiempo a esperar entre cada redibujado del HUD, en segundos. \nPuedes aumentar este valor si el rendimiento del juego se está viendo muy afectado, pero aumentará el parpadeo del HUD.
Velocidad de Refresco del HUD de IFF

Key.Original: Waiting time between HUD redraws, in seconds. \nYou can set this value higher if the game performance is badly affected, but you'll see the HUD flickering.
Key.English: Waiting time between HUD redraws, in seconds. \nYou can set this value higher if the game performance is badly affected, but you'll see the HUD flickering.
Key.Spanish: Tiempo a esperar entre cada redibujado del HUD, en segundos. \nPuedes aumentar este valor si el rendimiento del juego se está viendo muy afectado, pero aumentará el parpadeo del HUD.
Retraso de la Actualización de Datos

Key.Original: Waiting time between squad status and IFF checks, in seconds. \nSetting this value lower will keep the HUDs more up to date, but the game performance may be affected.
Key.English: Waiting time between squad status and IFF checks, in seconds. \nSetting this value lower will keep the HUDs more up to date, but the game performance may be affected.
Key.Spanish: Tiempo de espera entre las comprobaciones del estado del pelotón e IFF, en segundos. \nDisminuir este valor mantendrá los HUD más actualizados, pero esto puede afectar al rendimiento del juego.

Key.Original: Data Update Delay for IFF HUD
Key.English: Data Update Delay for IFF HUD
Key.Spanish: Retraso de la Actualización de Datos para HUD IFF

Key.Original: Waiting time between IFF HUD data updates, in seconds. \nSetting this value lower will keep the HUDs more up to date, but the game performance may be affected.
Key.English: Waiting time between IFF HUD data updates, in seconds. \nSetting this value lower will keep the HUDs more up to date, but the game performance may be affected.
Key.Spanish: Tiempo de espera entre las actualizaciones de los datos del HUD IFF, en segundos. \nDisminuir este valor mantendrá los HUD más actualizados, pero esto puede afectar al rendimiento del juego.

Key.Original: Display an icon indicating the AI unit's role and its health and ammo status, etc.
Key.English: Display an icon indicating the AI unit's role and its health and ammo status, etc.
Key.Spanish: Mostrar un icono indicando el rol de la unidad, su estado de salud y munición, etc.

Key.Original: Display descriptive text below the icon. The kind of text shown is controlled by the other text related options. \nNo text will be shown at all if this setting is deactivated, regardless of the other settings.
Key.English: Display descriptive text below the icon. The kind of text shown is controlled by the other text related options. \nNo text will be shown at all if this setting is deactivated, regardless of the other settings.
Key.Spanish: Mostrar texto descriptivo debajo del icono. El tipo de texto a mostrar está controlado por otros ajustes relacionados con el texto. \nNo se mostrará ningún texto si se desactiva este ajuste, sin importar el estado de otros ajustes.

Key.Original: Automatically change the color of the icon and text to match that of the unit's assigned team.
Key.English: Automatically change the color of the icon and text to match that of the unit's assigned team.
Key.Spanish: Cambia automáticamente el color del icono y del texto para que coincida con el color del equipo al que está asignada la unidad.

Key.Original: Maximum distance a unit has to be for its HUD info to show up, in meters.
Key.English: Maximum distance a unit has to be for its HUD info to show up, in meters.
Key.Spanish: Distancia máxima a la que una unidad ha de estar para que se muestre su información en el HUD, en metros.

Key.Original: Maximum distance a unit has to be for its HUD info to show up when the player is flying, in meters.
Key.English: Maximum distance a unit has to be for its HUD info to show up when the player is flying, in meters.
Key.Spanish: Distancia máxima a la que una unidad ha de estar para que se muestre su información en el HUD cuando el jugador está volando, en metros.

Key.Original: Time that must pass while the HUD is shown to display known enemy units when the key is pressed, in seconds.
Key.English: Time that must pass while the HUD is shown to display known enemy units when the key is pressed, in seconds.
Key.Spanish: Tiempo que ha de pasar hasta que se muestre el HUD de los enemigos conocidos cuando se pulse la tecla, en segundos.

Key.Original: How many known enemy unit locations will be displayed.\nSet it to -1 for unlimited.
Key.English: How many known enemy unit locations will be displayed.\nSet it to -1 for unlimited.
Key.Spanish: Cuántas posiciones de enemigos conocidos se mostrarán.\nEstablécelo a -1 para ilimitado.

Key.Original: No HUD elements will be shown for enemies below this distance, in meters. \nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.English: No HUD elements will be shown for enemies below this distance, in meters. \nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.Spanish: Por debajo de esta distancia no se mostrará ningún elemento del HUD para enemigos, en metros. \nEstablécelo a cero para que siempre se muestre, sin importar el alcance.

Key.Original: Maximum distance to look for enemies and display their HUD elements, in meters.
Key.English: Maximum distance to look for enemies and display their HUD elements, in meters.
Key.Spanish: Distancia máxima en la que se buscará a enemigos y se muestre su información en el HUD, en metros.

Key.Original: No HUD elements will be shown for enemies below this distance when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters. \nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.English: No HUD elements will be shown for enemies below this distance when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters. \nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.Spanish: Por debajo de esta distancia no se mostrará ningún elemento del HUD para enemigos cuando el jugador esté en un vehículo volador, en metros. \nEstablécelo a cero para que siempre se muestre, sin importar el alcance.

Key.Original: Maximum distance to look for enemies and display their HUD elements when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters.
Key.English: Maximum distance to look for enemies and display their HUD elements when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters.
Key.Spanish: Distancia máxima en la que se buscará a enemigos y se muestre su información en el HUD cuando el jugador esté en un vehículo volador, en metros.

Key.Original:
Enemy and friendly locations will ALWAYS be displayed as long as the player has an IFF device equipped. 
The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets (including Aegis')
Key.English:
Enemy and friendly locations will ALWAYS be displayed as long as the player has an IFF device equipped. 
The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets (including Aegis')
Key.Spanish:
La posición de los enemigos y amistosos se mostrará SIEMPRE si el jugador tiene equipado un Dispositivo IFF. 
Los dispositivos predeterminados son: 
 - Gafas de Combate (cualquier versión, incluyendo pasamontañas) 
 - Gafas Tácticas (cualquier versión) 
 - Sistema de Realidad Virtual 
 - Casco de Asesino (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco Defensor (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Piloto (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Operaciones Especiales (cualquier versión) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headset (incluyendo los de Aegis)
Visualización del HUD - Opciones de Texto

Key.Original:
Display the index of the unit in the player's group.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.English:
Display the index of the unit in the player's group.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar el índice de la unidad en el pelotón del jugador.
\n\nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si Mostrar Texto está desactivado.

Key.Original:
Display the unit's class name as seen in the Eden editor.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.English:
Display the unit's class name as seen in the Eden editor.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar la clase de la unidad tal como aparece en el editor Eden.
\n\nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si Mostrar Texto está desactivado.

Key.Original:
Display the unit's last name or alias.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.English:
Display the unit's last name or alias.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar el apellido o alias de la unidad.
\n\nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si Mostrar Texto está desactivado.

Key.Original:
Display the unit's role(s) text, which might be different from its original class. 
Some of the roles shown can be: 
 * Medic: The unit can heal and has a medikit. 
 * AT: The unit has a launcher weapon. 
 * Demo: The unit has some explosives in its inventory. 
These are just some examples. There are many more roles and each unit can have more than one role depending on its weapon, ammo, gear and traits.


This option will have no effect if Display Text is disabled.
Key.English:
Display the unit's role(s) text, which might be different from its original class. 
Some of the roles shown can be: 
 * Medic: The unit can heal and has a medikit. 
 * AT: The unit has a launcher weapon. 
 * Demo: The unit has some explosives in its inventory. 
These are just some examples. There are many more roles and each unit can have more than one role depending on its weapon, ammo, gear and traits.


This option will have no effect if Display Text is disabled.
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar el texto del rol(es) de la unidad, que puede ser diferente de su clase original. 
Algunos de los roles a mostrar pueden ser: 
 * Médico: La unidad puede curar y tiene un botiquín. 
 * AT: La unidad tiene un arma lanzadora. 
 * Demo: La unidad tiene algunos explosivos en su inventario. 
Estos son sólo algunos ejemplos. Hay muchos otros roles y cada unidad puede tener más de un rol dependiendo de su arma, munición, equipación y atributos.


Esta opción no tendrá efecto si Mostrar Texto está desactivado.

Key.Original:
Display the unit's role(s) icon, which might be different from its original class.
Some of the roles shown can be: 
 * Medic: The unit can heal and has a medikit. 
 * AT: The unit has a launcher weapon. 
 * Demo: The unit has some explosives in its inventory. 
These are just some examples. There are many more roles and each unit can have more than one role depending on its weapon, ammo, gear and traits.
Key.English:
Display the unit's role(s) icon, which might be different from its original class.
Some of the roles shown can be: 
 * Medic: The unit can heal and has a medikit. 
 * AT: The unit has a launcher weapon. 
 * Demo: The unit has some explosives in its inventory. 
These are just some examples. There are many more roles and each unit can have more than one role depending on its weapon, ammo, gear and traits.
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar el texto del rol(es) de la unidad, que puede ser diferente de su clase original. 
Algunos de los roles a mostrar pueden ser: 
 * Médico: La unidad puede curar y tiene un botiquín. 
 * AT: La unidad tiene un arma lanzadora. 
 * Demo: La unidad tiene algunos explosivos en su inventario. 
Estos sólo son algunos ejemplos. Hay muchos otros roles y cada unidad puede tener más de un rol dependiendo de su arma, munición, equipación y atributos.

Key.Original:
Display the distance of the squad unit from the player, in meters.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.English:
Display the distance of the squad unit from the player, in meters.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar la distancia a la que la unidad del pelotón está del jugador, en metros.
\n\nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si Mostrar Texto está desactivado.

Key.Original:
Display the distance of the enemy unit from the player, in meters.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.English:
Display the distance of the enemy unit from the player, in meters.
\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar la distancia a la que la unidad enemiga está del jugador, en metros.
\n\nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si Mostrar Texto está desactivado.

Key.Original:
Display a symbol instead of full text when a unit has a critical condition (injured, no ammo, etc). 
The symbols are: 
 ~ incapacitated 
 + injured 
 , bleeding 
 -| no primary ammo 
 |- no secondary ammo 
 -- no primary nor secondary ammo
Key.English:
Display a symbol instead of full text when a unit has a critical condition (injured, no ammo, etc). 
The symbols are: 
 ~ incapacitated 
 + injured 
 , bleeding 
 -| no primary ammo 
 |- no secondary ammo 
 -- no primary nor secondary ammo
Key.Spanish:
Mostrar un símbolo en vez de todo el texto cuando una unidad tiene una condición crítica (herido, sin munición, etc). 
Los símbolos son: 
 ~ incapacitado 
 + herido 
 , sangrando 
 -| sin munición de primaria 
 |- sin munición de secundaria 
 -- sin munición de primaria ni secundaria

Key.Original: If enabled, the displayed distance will be very close to the real distance. If disabled, it'll be the closest number in increments of 50m.
Key.English: If enabled, the displayed distance will be very close to the real distance. If disabled, it'll be the closest number in increments of 50m.
Key.Spanish: Si activo, la distancia mostrada será muy cercana a la distancia real. Si desactivado, se mostrará el número más próximo en incrementos de 50m.

Key.Original: Height of the icons for infantry units, relative to the default height.
Key.English: Height of the icons for infantry units, relative to the default height.
Key.Spanish: Altura de los iconos para unidades de infantería, relativa a la altura por defecto.

Key.Original: Horizontal position of the icons for infantry units, relative to the default horizontal position.
Key.English: Horizontal position of the icons for infantry units, relative to the default horizontal position.
Key.Spanish: Posición horizontal de los iconos para unidades de infantería, relativa a la posición horizontal por defecto.

Key.Original: Height of the icons for vehicles, relative to the default height.
Key.English: Height of the icons for vehicles, relative to the default height.
Key.Spanish: Altura de los iconos para vehículos, relativa a la altura por defecto.

Key.Original: Horizontal position of the icons for vehicles, relative to the default horizontal position.
Key.English: Horizontal position of the icons for vehicles, relative to the default horizontal position.
Key.Spanish: Posición horizontal de los iconos para vehículos, relativa a la posición horizontal por defecto.

Key.Original: Font used in all the texts.
Key.English: Font used in all the texts.
Key.Spanish: Fuente a usar en todos los textos.

Key.Original: Maximum opaqueness for all the elements of the HUD.
Key.English: Maximum opaqueness for all the elements of the HUD.
Key.Spanish: Opacidad máxima para todos los elementos del HUD.

Key.Original: Display Arrows and Text when Off-Screen
Key.English: Display Arrows and Text when Off-Screen
Key.Spanish: Mostrar Flechas y Texto Fuera de Pant.

Key.Original: Display arrows and text at the edge of the screen indicating the unit's relative position when it's not in view of the player.
Key.English: Display arrows and text at the edge of the screen indicating the unit's relative position when it's not in view of the player.
Key.Spanish: Mostrar flechas y texto en el borde de la pantalla indicando la posición relativa de la unidad cuando no esté a la vista del jugador.

Key.Original: Always display the indexes of your units when not in view, even when the squad HUD isn't active. \nIt only works if 'Display Arrows and Text' is active.
Key.English: Always display the indexes of your units when not in view, even when the squad HUD isn't active. \nIt only works if 'Display Arrows and Text' is active.
Key.Spanish: Mostrar siempre los índices de tus unidades cuando no estén a la vista, incluso cuando la HUD de pelotón no esté activa. \nSólo funciona si 'Mostrar Flechas y Texto' está activo.

Key.Original: Only display HUD elements on units not hidden by obstacles or terrain.
Key.English: Only display HUD elements on units not hidden by obstacles or terrain.
Key.Spanish: Mostrar sólamente los elementos del HUD para unidades no tapadas por obstáculos o terreno.
Escalar el Texto del HUD del Pelotón

Key.Original: The further away the unit is the smaller the text. When too far away the text won't be displayed. \nThis option only affects your squad units.
Key.English: The further away the unit is the smaller the text. When too far away the text won't be displayed. \nThis option only affects your squad units.
Key.Spanish: Contra más lejos esté la unidad más pequeño será el texto. El texto no se mostrará si está muy lejos. \nEsta opción sólo afecta a tus unidades del pelotón.

Key.Original: Display the indexes of all the crew of the group vehicles and their roles as crew (D for driver, C for commander, G for gunner, T for turret).
Key.English: Display the indexes of all the crew of the group vehicles and their roles as crew (D for driver, C for commander, G for gunner, T for turret).
Key.Spanish: Mostrar los índices de toda la tripulación de los vehículos del pelotón y sus roles como tripulación (D para conductor, C para comandante, G para artillero, T para torre).
Agrupar Unidades del Pelotón en los Vehículos

Key.Original: If enabled, when units are inside a vehicle only a HUD element will be displayed over such vehicle (instead of over every crew member), \nwith information about its crew, cargo and empty seats (displayed as E). \nIf disabled, every unit inside a vehicle will display a HUD element over their heads (same behaviour as if they weren't in a vehicle).
Key.English: If enabled, when units are inside a vehicle only a HUD element will be displayed over such vehicle (instead of over every crew member), \nwith information about its crew, cargo and empty seats (displayed as E). \nIf disabled, every unit inside a vehicle will display a HUD element over their heads (same behaviour as if they weren't in a vehicle).
Key.Spanish: Si se activa, cuando las unidades estén dentro de un vehículo sólo se mostrará un elemento del HUD sobre el vehículo (en vez de sobre cada miembro de la tripulación), \ncon información relativa a su tripulación, carga y asientos vacíos (mostrado como E). \nSi se desactiva, cada unidad dentro del vehículo mostrará un elemento del HUD sobre sus cabezas (el mismo comportamiento que si no estuviesen en un vehículo).
Mostrar las Unidades Fallecidas del Pelotón

Key.Original: Display the HUD over dead units which were part of the player's group.
Key.English: Display the HUD over dead units which were part of the player's group.
Key.Spanish: Mostrar el HUD sobre las unidades fallecidas que eran parte del pelotón del jugador.

Key.Original: Time that must pass while the HUD is shown to display dead units, in seconds.
Key.English: Time that must pass while the HUD is shown to display dead units, in seconds.
Key.Spanish: Tiempo que ha de pasar hasta que el HUD se muestre sobre las unidades fallecidas, en segundos.

Key.Original: If player is medic or the squad leader, always display information about injured, unconscious, units without ammo, etc. even when the \nSquad HUD key isn't pressed.
Key.English: If player is medic or the squad leader, always display information about injured, unconscious, units without ammo, etc. even when the \nSquad HUD key isn't pressed.
Key.Spanish: Si el jugador es médico o el líder del pelotón siempre se mostrará información sobre los heridos, inconscientes, unidades sin munición, etc. \naunque no se presione la tecla de HUD del pelotón.

Key.Original: If enabled, known enemy positions will be occluded by terrain and obstacles. When this happens, the last known enemy position will be displayed instead. \nIf disabled, the known enemy locations will always be visible.
Key.English: If enabled, known enemy positions will be occluded by terrain and obstacles. When this happens, the last known enemy position will be displayed instead. \nIf disabled, the known enemy locations will always be visible.
Key.Spanish: Si se activa, las posiciones de los enemigos conocidos serán ocluídas por el terreno y obstáculos. Cuando esto ocurra se mostrará la última posición conocida del enemigo. \nSi se desactiva, la posición de los enemigos conocidos será siempre visible.

Key.Original: If enabled, the occlusion checks will probably be a bit more peformance friendly at the cost of precision.
Key.English: If enabled, the occlusion checks will probably be a bit more peformance friendly at the cost of precision.
Key.Spanish: Si se activa, las comprobaciones de oclusión serán probablemente un poco mejores para el rendimiento, pero serán a su vez menos precisas.

Key.Original: Whether display last known positions or not.
Key.English: Whether display last known positions or not.
Key.Spanish: Determina si se muestra o no la última posición conocida.

Key.Original: If enabled, no icons will be displayed for units currently belonging to the civilian side.
Key.English: If enabled, no icons will be displayed for units currently belonging to the civilian side.
Key.Spanish: Si se activa, no se mostrarán iconos para las unidades que actualmente pertenezcan al bando civil.

Key.Original:
Choose whether display or not the IFF HUD when you're not in a group. 
 - Always: You will always track known enemy and friendly units. 
 - Never: No IFF info will be displayed when you're not in a group. 
 - Only with IFF Devices: As long as you have equipped an IFF device, the IFF HUD will be displayed regardless of you being in a group or not.
Key.English:
Choose whether display or not the IFF HUD when you're not in a group. 
 - Always: You will always track known enemy and friendly units. 
 - Never: No IFF info will be displayed when you're not in a group. 
 - Only with IFF Devices: As long as you have equipped an IFF device, the IFF HUD will be displayed regardless of you being in a group or not.
Key.Spanish:
Elige si mostrar o no el HUD de IFF cuando no estás en un grupo. 
 - Siempre: Siempre rastrearás a las unidades enemigas y amistosas. 
 - Nunca: No se mostrará información sobre IFF cuando no estés en un grupo. 
 - Sólo con Disp. IFF: Mientras lleves equipado un dispositivo IFF, el HUD de IFF se mostrará sin importar que estés en un grupo o no.

Key.Original: If enabled, you will always track your assigned target, even if the enemy HUD isn't currently activated.
Key.English: If enabled, you will always track your assigned target, even if the enemy HUD isn't currently activated.
Key.Spanish: Si se activa, siempre rastrearás a tu objetivo asignado, incluso si el HUD de enemigos no está actualmente activo.

Key.Original: Precise Visibilty Check for Enemy Vehicles
Key.English: Precise Visibilty Check for Enemy Vehicles

Key.Original: More precise visibility checks for enemy vehicles. \nThis will check all the corners of their bounding box instead of a single point, so it will affect performance.
Key.English: More precise visibility checks for enemy vehicles. \nThis will check all the corners of their bounding box instead of a single point, so it will affect performance.
Key.Spanish: Comprobación de visibilidad más precisa para vehículos enemigos. \nEsto hará que se comprueben todas las esquinas de la caja delimitadora en vez de un sólo punto, así que afectará al rendimiento.

Key.Original: Only display last known enemy positions
Key.English: Only display last known enemy positions
Key.Spanish: Sólo Mostrar Última Posición de Enemigos

Key.Original:
How will enemy position be displayed: 
 - Always: You won't be able to see the overhead icons of enemies. 
 - Never: The overhead icon will always be displayed for enemy units, regardless of you having an IFF device equipped or not. 
 - When not using IFF Device: With an equipped IFF Device you'll be able to see the enemy overhead icons. Otherwise you'll only be able to see their last known position.
Key.English:
How will enemy position be displayed: 
 - Always: You won't be able to see the overhead icons of enemies. 
 - Never: The overhead icon will always be displayed for enemy units, regardless of you having an IFF device equipped or not. 
 - When not using IFF Device: With an equipped IFF Device you'll be able to see the enemy overhead icons. Otherwise you'll only be able to see their last known position.
Key.Spanish:
Cómo se mostrarán las posiciones enemigas: 
 - Siempre: Jamás verás los iconos sobre las cabezas de los enemigos que están a la vista. 
 - Nunca: Los iconos sobre las cabezas de los enemigos se mostrarán siemrpe, sin importar si llevas equipado un dispositivo IFF. 
 - Cuando no use Disp. IFF: Cuando lleves un dispositivo IFF equipado podrás ver los iconos sobre las cabezas de los enemigos. Si no lo llevas, sólo podrás ver su última posición conocida.

Key.Original: If enabled, the type of icons shown for enemies when they are BLUFOR will be those of NATO.
Key.English: If enabled, the type of icons shown for enemies when they are BLUFOR will be those of NATO.
Key.Spanish: Si se activa, el tipo de iconos mostrado para enemigos cuando sean BLUFOR serán los de la OTAN.
Usar Colores del Bando para Enemigos

Key.Original:
If enabled, the color for enemy icons will change depending on their side (default is blue for WEST, red for EAST, green for RESISTANCE 
and purple for CIVILIAN). 
 - 'Never' will use the default enemy color. 
 - 'Current side' will use the color of the side the unit currently belongs to. 
 - 'Faction' will display the original side colors for the unit's faction, ignoring the side of its current leader (so OPFOR factions will always 
be red, BLUFOR blue, etc)
Key.English:
If enabled, the color for enemy icons will change depending on their side (default is blue for WEST, red for EAST, green for RESISTANCE 
and purple for CIVILIAN). 
 - 'Never' will use the default enemy color. 
 - 'Current side' will use the color of the side the unit currently belongs to. 
 - 'Faction' will display the original side colors for the unit's faction, ignoring the side of its current leader (so OPFOR factions will always 
be red, BLUFOR blue, etc)
Key.Spanish:
Si se activa, el color de los iconos de los enemigos cambiará dependiendo de su bando (por defecto es azul para OESTE, rojo para ESTE, verde para RESISTENCIA 
y púrpura para CIVILES): 
 - 'Nunca' usará el color de enemigos por defecto. 
 - 'Bando actual' usará el color del bando al que pertenece la unidad. 
 - 'Facción' usará el color original del bando de la facción de la unidad, ignorando el bando de su líder actual (así que las facciones OPFOR siempre serán rojas, 
BLUFOR azules, etc)

Key.Original:
Add here any other goggles you want to be able to use to track known enemies.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyGogglesClass1, MyGogglesClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles
Key.English:
Add here any other goggles you want to be able to use to track known enemies.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyGogglesClass1, MyGogglesClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles
Key.Spanish:
Añade aquí cualquier otras gafas de protección que quieras usar para rastrear enemigos conocidos.


La lista ha de contener nombres de clase (sin las comillas "") y separados por comas. 
Ejemplo: MiClaseGafasProtec1, MiClaseGafasProtec2, etc 

Los dispositivos predeterminados son: 
 - Gafas de Combate (cualquier versión, incluyendo pasamontañas) 
 - Gafas Tácticas (cualquier versión) 
 - Sistema de Realidad Virtual

Key.Original:
Add here any other helmets you want to be able to use to track known enemies.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHelmetClass1, MyHelmetClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version)
Key.English:
Add here any other helmets you want to be able to use to track known enemies.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHelmetClass1, MyHelmetClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version)
Key.Spanish:
Añade aquí cualquier otros cascos que quieras usar para rastrear enemigos conocidos.


La lista ha de contener nombres de clase (sin las comillas "") y separados por comas. 
Ejemplo: MiClaseCasco1, MiClaseCasco2, etc 

Los dispositivos predeterminados son: 
 - Casco de Asesino (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco Defensor (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Piloto (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Operaciones Especiales (cualquier versión)

Key.Original:
Add here any other Head Mounted Displays (like NVGs) you want to be able to use to track known enemies.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHMDClass1, MyHMDClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets (including Aegis')
Key.English:
Add here any other Head Mounted Displays (like NVGs) you want to be able to use to track known enemies.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHMDClass1, MyHMDClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets (including Aegis')
Key.Spanish:
Añade aquí cualquier otros 'Head Mounted Displays' (como las Gafas de Visión Nocturna) que quieras usar para rastrear enemigos conocidos.


La lista ha de contener nombres de clase (sin las comillas "") y separados por comas. 
Ejemplo: MiClaseHMD1, MiClaseHMD2, etc 

Los dispositivos predeterminados son: 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets (incluyendo los de Aegis)

Key.Original:
Add here any goggles you want to exclude from the IFF tracking.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyGogglesClass1, MyGogglesClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - RHS Goggles and Shemags 
 - Western Sahara's Dust Goggles
Key.English:
Add here any goggles you want to exclude from the IFF tracking.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyGogglesClass1, MyGogglesClass2, etc 

The pre-defined devices are: 
 - RHS Goggles and Shemags 
 - Western Sahara's Dust Goggles
Key.Spanish:
Añade aquí cualquier otras gafas de protección que quieras excluir del IFF.


La lista ha de contener nombres de clase (sin las comillas "") y separados por comas. 
Ejemplo: MiClaseGafasProtec1, MiClaseGafasProtec2, etc 

Los dispositivos predeterminados son: 
 - RHS Gafas y Afganos 
 - Las gafas antipolvo de Western Sahara

Key.Original:
Add here any other helmets you want to exclude from the IFF tracking.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHelmetClass1, MyHelmetClass2, etc
Key.English:
Add here any other helmets you want to exclude from the IFF tracking.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHelmetClass1, MyHelmetClass2, etc
Key.Spanish:
Añade aquí cualquier otros cascos que quieras excluir del IFF.


La lista ha de contener nombres de clase (sin las comillas "") y separados por comas. 
Ejemplo: MiClaseCasco1, MiClaseCasco2, etc

Key.Original:
Add here any other Head Mounted Displays (like NVGs) you want to exclude from the IFF tracking.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHMDClass1, MyHMDClass2, etc
Key.English:
Add here any other Head Mounted Displays (like NVGs) you want to exclude from the IFF tracking.


The list must be class names (without quotation marks "") and separated by commas. 
Example: MyHMDClass1, MyHMDClass2, etc
Key.Spanish:
Añade aquí cualquier otros 'Head Mounted Displays' (como las Gafas de Visión Nocturna) que quieras excluir del IFF.


La lista ha de contener nombres de clase (sin las comillas "") y separados por comas. 
Ejemplo: MiClaseHMD1, MiClaseHMD2, etc

Key.Original: Default color used for all the elements of the HUD.
Key.English: Default color used for all the elements of the HUD.
Key.Spanish: Color por defecto usado por todos los elementos del HUD.

Key.Original: Color used for units assigned to the red player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.English: Color used for units assigned to the red player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades asignadas al equipo rojo del jugador. \nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si los colores están desactivados.

Key.Original: Color used for units assigned to the green player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.English: Color used for units assigned to the green player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades asignadas al equipo verde del jugador. \nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si los colores están desactivados.

Key.Original: Color used for units assigned to the blue player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.English: Color used for units assigned to the blue player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades asignadas al equipo azul del jugador. \nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si los colores están desactivados.

Key.Original: Color used for units assigned to the yellow player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.English: Color used for units assigned to the yellow player's team. \nThis option won't have any effect if colors are deactivated.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades asignadas al equipo amarillo del jugador. \nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si los colores están desactivados.
Color del enemigo para el Objetivo Asignado

Key.Original: Color used for enemy units assigned as the player's target.
Key.English: Color used for enemy units assigned as the player's target.
Key.Spanish: Color usado por las unidades enemigas asignadas como objetivo del jugador.

Key.Original: Enemy color for East and Global
Key.English: Enemy color for East and Global
Key.Spanish: Color del enemigo para Este y Global

Key.Original: Color used for enemy units in general or when enemy units are OPFOR side and 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for enemy units in general or when enemy units are OPFOR side and 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades enemigas en general o cuando las unidades enemigas son OPFOR y 'Usar Colores del Bando para Enemigos' está activado.

Key.Original: Color used for enemy units of BLUFOR side if 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for enemy units of BLUFOR side if 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades enemigas de BLUFOR si 'Usar Colores del Bando para Enemigos' está activado.

Key.Original: Color used for enemy units of RESISTANCE side if 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for enemy units of RESISTANCE side if 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades enemigas de RESISTANCE si 'Usar Colores del Bando para Enemigos' está activado.

Key.Original: Color used for enemy units of CIVILIAN side if 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for enemy units of CIVILIAN side if 'Use enemy side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades enemigas de CIVILIAN si 'Usar Colores del Bando para Enemigos' está activado.

Key.Original:
Choose when to display known friendlies. 

If 'Only with IFF device' is chosen the HUD will only be shown when you have equipped one of these: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets 

You can add more in the 'Additional IFF Devices' section in Settings 2.
Key.English:
Choose when to display known friendlies. 

If 'Only with IFF device' is chosen the HUD will only be shown when you have equipped one of these: 
 - Combat Goggles (any version, including balaclavas) 
 - Tactical Glasses (any version) 
 - VR Goggles 
 - Assassin Helmet (any version) 
 - Defender Helmet (any version) 
 - Fighter Pilot Helmet (any version) 
 - Special Purpose Helmet (any version) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets 

You can add more in the 'Additional IFF Devices' section in Settings 2.
Key.Spanish:
Elige cuándo mostrar la posición de los amistosos conocidos. 

Si eliges 'Sólo con Disp. IFF' el HUD solo se mostrará cuando tengas equipado uno de estos: 
 - Gafas de Combate (cualquier versión, incluyendo pasamontañas) 
 - Gafas Tácticas (cualquier versión) 
 - Sistema de Realidad Virtual 
 - Casco de Asesino (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco Defensor (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Piloto (cualquier versión) 
 - Casco de Operaciones Especiales (cualquier versión) 
 - Integrated Visual Augmentation System (IVAS) Headsets 

Puedes añadir más en la sección 'Dispositivos IFF Adicionales' de Ajustes 2.

Key.Original: Time that must pass while the HUD is shown to display known friendly units when the IFF HUD key is pressed, in seconds.
Key.English: Time that must pass while the HUD is shown to display known friendly units when the IFF HUD key is pressed, in seconds.
Key.Spanish: TTiempo que ha de pasar para que el HUD muestre las unidades amistosas conocidas cuando la tecla de HUD de IFF es presionada, en segundos.

Key.Original: How many friendly units will be displayed. Set it to -1 for unlimited.
Key.English: How many friendly units will be displayed. Set it to -1 for unlimited.
Key.Spanish: Cuántas unidades amistosas se mostrarán. Establécelo a -1 para ilimitadas.

Key.Original: No HUD elements will be shown for friendlies below this distance, in meters.\nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.English: No HUD elements will be shown for friendlies below this distance, in meters.\nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.Spanish: Por debajo de esta distancia no se mostrará ningún elemento del HUD para amistosos, en metros.\nEstablécelo a cero para que siempre se muestre, sin importar el alcance.

Key.Original: No HUD elements will be shown for friendlies below this distance when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters.\nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.English: No HUD elements will be shown for friendlies below this distance when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters.\nSet to zero to always show regardless of range.
Key.Spanish: Por debajo de esta distancia no se mostrará ningún elemento del HUD para amistosos cuando el jugador esté en un vehículo volador, en metros.\nEstablécelo a cero para que siempre se muestre, sin importar el alcance.

Key.Original: Maximum distance to look for friendlies and display their HUD elements, in meters.
Key.English: Maximum distance to look for friendlies and display their HUD elements, in meters.
Key.Spanish: Distancia máxima en la que se buscará a amistosos y se muestre su información en el HUD, en metros.

Key.Original: Maximum distance to look for friendlies and display their HUD elements when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters.
Key.English: Maximum distance to look for friendlies and display their HUD elements when the player is in an air vehicle, in meters.
Key.Spanish: Distancia máxima en la que se buscará a amistosos y se muestre su información en el HUD cuando el jugador esté en un vehículo volador, en metros.

Key.Original: Display the distance of the friendly unit from the player, in meters.\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.English: Display the distance of the friendly unit from the player, in meters.\n\nThis option will have no effect if Show Text is disabled.
Key.Spanish: Mostrar la distancia a la que la unidad amistosa está del jugador, en metros.\n\nEsta opción no tendrá efecto si Mostrar Texto está desactivado.

Key.Original: If enabled, known friendly positions will be occluded by terrain and obstacles. When this happens, the last known friendly position will be displayed instead.\nIf disabled, the known friendly locations will always be visible.
Key.English: If enabled, known friendly positions will be occluded by terrain and obstacles. When this happens, the last known friendly position will be displayed instead.\nIf disabled, the known friendly locations will always be visible.
Key.Spanish: Si se activa, las posiciones de los amistosos conocidos serán ocluídas por el terreno y obstáculos. Cuando esto ocurra se mostrará la última posición conocida del amistoso. \nSi se desactiva, la posición de los amistosos conocidos será siempre visible.

Key.Original: Precise Visibilty Check for Friendly Vehicles
Key.English: Precise Visibilty Check for Friendly Vehicles

Key.Original: More precise visibility checks for friendly vehicles.\nThis will check all the corners of their bounding box instead of a single point, so it will affect performance.
Key.English: More precise visibility checks for friendly vehicles.\nThis will check all the corners of their bounding box instead of a single point, so it will affect performance.
Key.Spanish: Comprobación de visibilidad más precisa para vehículos amistosos.\nEsto hará que se comprueben todas las esquinas de la caja delimitadora en vez de un sólo punto, así que afectará al rendimiento.

Key.Original: Only display last known friendly positions
Key.English: Only display last known friendly positions
Key.Spanish: Sólo Mostrar Última Posición de Amistosos

Key.Original:
How will friendly position be displayed: 
 - Always: You won't be able to see the overhead icons of friendlies that aren't occluded. 
 - Never: The overhead icon will always be displayed for friendly units, regardless you having an IFF device equipped or not. 
 - When not using IFF Device: With an equipped IFF Device you'll be able to see the friendly overhead icons. Otherwise you'll only be able to see their last known position.
Key.English:
How will friendly position be displayed: 
 - Always: You won't be able to see the overhead icons of friendlies that aren't occluded. 
 - Never: The overhead icon will always be displayed for friendly units, regardless you having an IFF device equipped or not. 
 - When not using IFF Device: With an equipped IFF Device you'll be able to see the friendly overhead icons. Otherwise you'll only be able to see their last known position.
Key.Spanish:
Cómo se mostrarán las posiciones amistosas: 
 - Siempre: Jamás verás los iconos sobre las cabezas de los amistosos que están a la vista. 
 - Nunca: Los iconos sobre las cabezas de los amistosos se mostrarán siemrpe, sin importar si llevas equipado un dispositivo IFF. 
 - Cuando no use Disp. IFF: Cuando lleves un dispositivo IFF equipado podrás ver los iconos sobre las cabezas de los amistosos. Si no lo llevas, sólo podrás ver su última posición conocida.
Usar Colores del Bando para Amistosos

Key.Original:
If enabled, the color for friendly icons will change depending on their side (default is blue for WEST, red for EAST, green for RESISTANCE 
and purple for CIVILIAN). 
 - 'Never' will use the default friendly color. 
 - 'Current side' will use the color of the side the unit currently belongs to. 
 - 'Faction' will display the original side colors for the unit's faction, ignoring the side of its current leader (so OPFOR factions will always 
be red, BLUFOR blue, etc)
Key.English:
If enabled, the color for friendly icons will change depending on their side (default is blue for WEST, red for EAST, green for RESISTANCE 
and purple for CIVILIAN). 
 - 'Never' will use the default friendly color. 
 - 'Current side' will use the color of the side the unit currently belongs to. 
 - 'Faction' will display the original side colors for the unit's faction, ignoring the side of its current leader (so OPFOR factions will always 
be red, BLUFOR blue, etc)
Key.Spanish:
Si se activa, el color de los iconos de los amistosos cambiará dependiendo de su bando (por defecto es azul para OESTE, rojo para ESTE, verde para RESISTENCIA 
y púrpura para CIVILES): 
 - 'Nunca' usará el color de amistosos por defecto. 
 - 'Bando actual' usará el color del bando al que pertenece la unidad. 
 - 'Facción' usará el color original del bando de la facción de la unidad, ignorando el bando de su líder actual (así que las facciones OPFOR siempre serán rojas, 
BLUFOR azules, etc)

Key.Original: Friendly color for West and Global
Key.English: Friendly color for West and Global
Key.Spanish: Color de Oeste y Global para Amistosos

Key.Original: Color used for friendly units in general or when friendly units are BLUFOR side and 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for friendly units in general or when friendly units are BLUFOR side and 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades amistosas en general o cuando las unidades amistosas son BLUFOR y 'Usar Colores del Bando para Amistosos' está activado.

Key.Original: Color used for friendly units of OPFOR side if 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for friendly units of OPFOR side if 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades enemigas de OPFOR si 'Usar Colores del Bando para Amistosos' está activado.

Key.Original: Color used for friendly units of RESISTANCE side if 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for friendly units of RESISTANCE side if 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades enemigas de RESISTANCE si 'Usar Colores del Bando para Amistosos' está activado.

Key.Original: Color used for friendly units of CIVILIAN side if 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.English: Color used for friendly units of CIVILIAN side if 'Use friendly side colors' is enabled.
Key.Spanish: Color usado para las unidades enemigas de CIVILIAN si 'Usar Colores del Bando para Amistosos' está activado.

Key.Original: Sound to play when activating or deactivating the Squad HUD.
Key.English: Sound to play when activating or deactivating the Squad HUD.
Key.Spanish: Sonido a reproducir cuando se activa o desactiva la HUD del Pelotón.

Key.Original: Sound to play when activating or deactivating the IFF HUD if you don't have equipped an IFF device.
Key.English: Sound to play when activating or deactivating the IFF HUD if you don't have equipped an IFF device.
Key.Spanish: Sonido a reproducir cuando se activa o desactiva la HUD de IFF y no tienes equipado un dispositivo IFF.

Key.Original: Sound to play when activating or deactivating the IFF HUD if you have equipped an IFF device.
Key.English: Sound to play when activating or deactivating the IFF HUD if you have equipped an IFF device.
Key.Spanish: Sonido a reproducir cuando se activa o desactiva la HUD de IFF y tienes equipado un dispositivo IFF.

Key.Original: Use a custom callsign for each unit in your squad. The type can be that of his role, last name or none, which will default to the vanilla callsign (numbers). \nOnly names that have voice lines recorded will be used. Otherwise, it will default to its role. \nUnits that have a callsign already set by the mission will be excluded.
Key.English: Use a custom callsign for each unit in your squad. The type can be that of his role, last name or none, which will default to the vanilla callsigns (numbers). \nOnly names that have voice lines recorded will be used. Otherwise, it will default to its role. \nUnits that have a callsign already set by the mission will be excluded.
Key.Spanish: Usar un alias personalizado para cada unidad de tu pelotón. Puede ser de los siguientes tipos: rol, apellido o ninguno, que reverterá a los alias por defecto (números). \nSólo se usarán los nombres que tienen voces grabadas. En caso contrario, se usará su rol. \nLas unidades que ya tienen un alias asignado por la misión serán excluidas.

Key.Original: Callsign for the player if not set by the mission.
Key.English: Callsign for the player if not set by the mission.
Key.Spanish: Alias del jugador si no se ha establecido en la misión.

Key.Original:
Changes the last names of all the squad units to a random one which has recorded lines. 
You may want this to make sure all your units can be called by name. 
The names will be chosen based on the language used by the unit. Units with already valid names will be excluded. 

This will most likely create inconsistencies with some missions and settings. Enable at your own discretion. 
This setting will be applied next time you start a mission or whenever your current group changes.
Key.English:
Changes the last names of all the squad units to a random one which has recorded lines. 
You may want this to make sure all your units can be called by name. 
The names will be chosen based on the language used by the unit. Units with already valid names will be excluded. 

This will most likely create inconsistencies with some missions and settings. Enable at your own discretion. 
This setting will be applied next time you start a mission or whenever your current group changes.
Key.Spanish:
Cambia los apellidos de todas las unidades del pelotón a otro aleatorio que tiene líneas de voz grabadas. 
Puedes querer esto para asegurarte de que puedes llamar por su apellido a todas tus unidades. 
Los nombres estarán basados en el idioma que use la unidad. Las unidades que ya tengan apellidos válidos serán excluidas. 

Esto muy probablemente provocará inconsistencias en algunas misiones y entornos. Actívalo a tu propia discreción. 
Este ajuste se aplicará en la siguiente misión o en cuanto tu grupo actual cambie.
